page.title: 19Burning Barn _ Totton
page.content: One day a barn caught fire. Planners wanted to make a Community Centre out of it but I don't think they can because its burnt down. It was destroyed by vandals. The fire was an accident but vandals destroyed tiles and brickwork. The site has been farmed for 1000 years. {Totton Teenagers Escape}: Last week on the Dibden Purlieu roundabout a car caught fire. The occupants got out very quickly but as they got out, the seats caught fire. They went to get help & as the fire engine came, the car was bursting with flames & smoke. Luckily the teenages were not hurt.
